headline: Mosaic Announces Agreement to Sell Brazilian Potash Mining Operations to VL Mineração
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is among the 13 Best Magnesium Stocks to Invest in Now. The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) has decided to sell Mosaic Potassio Mineração Ltda, which operates the Taquari-Vassouras potash mine in Sergipe, Brazil, to VL Mineração Ltda. The arrangement includes up to $27 million in cash payments, $12 million at closure, $10 […]
